channel.title: PKing zones
channel.description: how do i make vorrack a pking zone?

item.title: PKing zones
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

ok… i think i got it…

open ur client.javaj and find this:

public void checkwildy()

it should look like this:

public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = false; // Xerozcheez: Set to false for pking boundaries } else { inwildy = true; } }

where it says:

if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672))

change it to this:

(absX >= 3177 && absX <= 9999 && absY >= 3381 && absY <= 9999) ||

it should make varrock a pk zone. the only thing is i didnt test it, and it makes everything east of varrock a pk zone, im too lazy to make the whole thing, but u got what u wanted.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 18, 2007, 10:02:07 PM[/size][hr]maybe get rid of the 2 “||”

Read full topic
